overview:
Andrew Cromarty is the Chief Technology Officer of Union Square Advisors. Prior to joining Union Square, Dr. Cromarty gained executive-level experience as the CTO or CIO of numerous technology companies, including DAX Solutions, SoftNet Systems, ISP Channel, Intellicom (the former Xerox Skyway) and Aerzone.

He also has served on several corporate boards, including as Chairman of the Lucent spinout Freewire Networks. Dr. Cromarty spent the first 15 years of his career as a researcher and software development manager at DECâ€™s (later Compaqâ€™s) Western Research Laboratory and Network Systems Laboratory, where his industry-leading research focused on broadband multimedia content delivery, and at various Silicon Valley startups.
